page.title: 20CHELTENHAM FAMILY SHOPPING
page.content: This is some information about shopping habits of members of Cheltenham families in 1985. We found out our information by children thinking of questions and taking them home and asking their families. Questions and most common answers: Who went? mother with child When? weekday Where? city centre What for? food and drink Transport? own car How paid? cash Why there? choice of items Out of 65 replies 9 were mother with child went on Saturday in their own car to buy food and drink in a city centre supermarket and paid by cash or cheque. They chose it because of good choice, parking and economy.
